name: OBSOLETE DAHDI for HFC-S PCI A
short_description:
Please go to https://sourceforge.net/projects/dahdi-hfcs/ instead.

OBSOLETE:
In order to RENAME this project to a better name dahdi-hfcs I decided not to use the complex function unix name renaming, but simply create a new project. That's because there are no important feature in this project anyways.

PLEASE GO TO PROJECT DAHDI-HFCS, THIS PROJECT DAHDI-ZAPHFC HAS BEEN RENAMED TO DAHDI-HFCS AND WON'T BE CONTINUED. THANKS! :-)

Latest Digium DAHDI svn trunk plus adopted and properly renamed zaphfc driver plus latest OSLEC svn trunk, all ready to compile out-of-the-box and only compile the things you need to drive a HFC PCI card. Digium hardware drivers aren't built by default to safe time and space for those not possessing such hardware. They can still be configured to build though.
summary: OBSOLETE: (Latest DAHDI + HFC-S + latest OSLEC) all in one git tree.
